title: GeologicSpecimenView
description: <font color="#4f81bd">GeologicSpecimenView</font> is a simplified view of a point-located specimen from GeoSciML <font color="#4f81bd">GeologicSpecimen</font> (an extension of Observations & Measurements - ISO19156) with key property values summarised as labels (unconstrained character strings) or arbitrarily selected classifiers to be used for thematic mapping purposes. The latter are the properties suffixed with “_uri” and will contain URIs referring to controlled concepts in published vocabularies.

identifier.title: identifier
identifier.description:
Globally unique identifier (eg, an IGSN sample number).  Should have the same value as a corresponding GeoSciML GeologicSpecimen.  Globally unique <font color="#4f81bd">identifier:Primitive::CharacterString</font> shall uniquely identifies a tuple within the dataset. Identifiers shall be formatted as URI according to RFC 3986.  This URI could be used to access more detailed, such as a GeoSciML Basic, representation of the feature

If present, the URI should resolve to a representation that corresponds to an instance of GeoSciML GeologicSpecimen.

label.title: label
label.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">label:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a short label for map display. (e.g., a sample number).

description.title: description
description.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">description:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a detailed description of the specimen.

specimenType.title: specimenType
specimenType.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">specimentType:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a human readable description of the specimen type (e.g., hand specimen, thin section, drill core).  To report an identifier from a controlled vocabulary, specimenType_uri shall be used.

materialClass.title: materialClass
materialClass.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">materialClass:Primitive::CharacterString</font> reports the classification of the material that comprises the specimen (e.g., rock, sediment, etc.).  To report an identifier from a controlled vocabulary, <font color="#4f81bd">materialClass_uri</font> shall be used.

positionalAccuracy.title: positionalAccuracy
positionalAccuracy.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">positionalAccuracy:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a description of the positional accuracy of the sampling location. (e.g., 50 metres).

samplingTime.title: samplingTime
samplingTime.description:
If present, the property samplingTime:Primitive::CharacterString reports a date or a date with time of when the specimen was collected formatted according to ISO 8601. Examples:  
  • 2012-03-28
  • 2008-02-28T14:15:23-05

samplingMethod.title: samplingMethod
samplingMethod.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">samplingMethod:Primitive::CharacterString</font> reports the method used to collect the specimen (e.g., diamond drilling, field mapping survey).

currentLocation.title: currentLocation
currentLocation.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">currentLocation:Primitive::CharacterString</font> reports the current location of the specimen (e.g., a warehouse or other repository location).

source.title: source
source.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">source:Primitive::CharacterString</font> reports the citation of the source of the data (e.g., a publication, map, etc.).

specimenType_uri.title: specimenType_uri
specimenType_uri.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">specimentType_uri:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a URI link for a specimen type identifier from a controlled vocabulary.

materialClass_uri.title: materialClass_uri
materialClass_uri.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">materialClass_uri:Primitive::CharacterString </font>contains a URI link for a class of material drawn from a controlled vocabulary.

metadata_uri.title: metadata_uri
metadata_uri.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">metadata_uri:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a URI link to a metadata document.

genericSymbolizer.title: genericSymbolizer
genericSymbolizer.description: If present, the <font color="#4f81bd">genericSymbolizer:Primitive::CharacterString</font> property contains an identifier for a symbol from standard (locally or community defined) symbolization scheme for portrayal.

any-1.title: any
any-1.description: A data provider can add an arbitrary number of extra properties, as long as the instance is conformant to GML Simple Feature Level 0.
